seo.title: Varun Rathod - Full-Stack & Systems Developer
seo.description: B.Tech CSE student at PES University specializing in full-stack development, systems programming, and cybersecurity.
seo.keywords: full-stack developer, systems programming, Python, C, Dart, Flutter, JavaScript, React, Node.js, cybersecurity, PES University
seo.author: Varun Rathod

paragraphs: Hi! I'm Varun Rathod, a Computer Science undergraduate at PES University passionate about building technology from the ground up — and securing it. I work across the full spectrum: systems programming, full-stack development, mobile apps, and applied machine learning.

I've built secure VoIP systems with raw sockets, developed Linux kernel modules, created full-stack platforms (PESUbytes), mobile apps in Flutter (Leetingo), and trained many ML models too. Currently expanding into cybersecurity and security-focused AI — exploring threat detection, anomaly analysis, and secure automation through CTFs and hands-on projects.
I value continuous learning, clean and secure engineering, and ethical innovation. Always open to connecting with people in tech, research, and security communities!

footer.tagline: Always open to connecting with people in tech, research, and security communities. Let's connect and grow together!
